Class playn.core.Layer.Util

Added Methods
int graphDepth(Layer) Returns the depth of the given layer in its local scene graph.
int indexInParent(Layer) Returns the index of the given layer within its parent, or -1 if the parent is null.
HasSize layerUnderPoint(Layer, Point) Performs the recursion for float).
HasSize layerUnderPoint(float, float) Gets the layer underneath the given screen coordinates, ignoring hit testers.
